<h3 id="X38054">X(38054) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(7), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 5*(b+c)*a^2-2*(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38054) = X(7)+2*X(1125) = 2*X(9)-5*X(19862) = X(10)-4*X(142) = 5*X(10)-8*X(3826) = X(10)+2*X(5542) = 7*X(10)-4*X(24393) = X(10)+8*X(25557) = 3*X(10)-2*X(38210) = 5*X(142)-2*X(3826) = 2*X(142)+X(5542) = 7*X(142)-X(24393) = X(142)+2*X(25557) = 6*X(142)-X(38210) = 4*X(3826)+5*X(5542) = 14*X(3826)-5*X(24393) = X(3826)+5*X(25557) = 4*X(3826)-5*X(38204) = 12*X(3826)-5*X(38210) = 7*X(5542)+2*X(24393) = X(5542)-4*X(25557) = 3*X(5542)+X(38210)</b>
<p>X(38054) lies on these lines: {1,7613}, {2,5850}, {7,1125}, {9,5551}, {10,141}, {144,3624}, {238,4896}, {376,516}, {390,3636}, {392,3671}, {515,38030}, {517,38041}, {519,11038}, {527,19883}, {726,27475}, {758,38056}, {946,31657}, {952,38172}, {971,3742}, {1001,5267}, {1086,4356}, {1156,33709}, {2550,3244}, {2800,38124}, {2801,38158}, {2802,38055}, {3059,3881}, {3243,3625}, {3306,15298}, {3616,4312}, {3634,5223}, {3664,16475}, {3683,4114}, {3828,5686}, {3841,6067}, {3947,5439}, {3950,28516}, {3982,4423}, {4297,5805}, {4301,10179}, {4321,30275}, {4349,4675}, {4353,4648}, {4669,38200}, {4847,27186}, {4888,16020}, {5045,15587}, {5249,10861}, {5550,20059}, {5696,11025}, {5762,10165}, {5784,20116}, {5785,10980}, {5817,10171}, {5833,11036}, {5843,11230}, {5845,38049}, {5847,38046}, {5851,32557}, {5852,38062}, {5880,30331}, {7672,33815}, {8227,36996}, {8232,10200}, {8732,10198}, {9776,13405}, {9843,21617}, {10164,38122}, {10175,38171}, {10177,11263}, {10427,21630}, {12571,36991}, {12577,28629}, {12609,21625}, {15673,17768}, {18230,19878}, {20119,33812}, {24231,29571}, {24929,33558}, {28160,38137}, {28194,38065}, {28204,38080}, {28234,38121}, {28236,38149}, {33682,38048}, {38057,38093}</p>
<p>
X(38054) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5542, 38204}, {6173, 38053}, {11038, 38052}, {21151, 38036}, {38030, 38107}, {38041, 38111}<br>
X(38054) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10, 38204), (551, 38053), (4669, 38200), (5686, 3828), (5817, 10171), (10164, 38122), (10175, 38171), (38123, 38111), (38151, 38107), (38201, 38052), (38204, 142)<br>
X(38054) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (142, 5542, 10), (142, 25557, 5542), (21255, 24325, 10), (38024, 38052, 11038), (38094, 38201, 38052), (38207, 38208, 38172)<br>
</p>
